sys_openapi_operation.name: Add assignment between location, person, branch, incident or persongroup and a single asset.
sys_openapi_operation.serialized_operation: {"fName":"Add assignment between location, person, branch, incident or persongroup and a single asset.","fOperationId":"assign","fDescription":"This API assigns a branch, location, incident, person or person group to an asset. To assign something to an asset, you need to provide the type of the assignment (linkType) and the ID of the card you want to assign.","fPath":"/assetmgmt/assets/assignments","fHttpMethod":"PUT","fDeprecated":false,"fRequest":{"fDescription":"linkType should be one of the possible values. linkToId - and branchId, for locations - should be provided accordingly.","fRequired":true,"fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"requestapplicationjson8530111196","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/Link to be added","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}]},"fResponses":[{"fStatusCode":"200","fDescription":"successful operation","fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"responseapplicationjson1910642821","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/Link","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"400","fDescription":"When link already exists, or when link exists to location\u0027s parent branch or branch\u0027s child location","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"403","fDescription":"When user doesn\u0027t have \u0027write\u0027 permission for the card type they want to link the asset to.","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"404","fDescription":"When asset is not found","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]}],"fParameters":[]}
sys_openapi_operation.sys_name: Add assignment between location, person, branch, incident or persongroup and a single asset.
